creator: jhut@inst.strykercorp.com
text:
I duplicated the scenario that is in effect in the Struts template custom tags 
using jsp:include to reproduce an error I earlier reported in Struts:

http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=1486

The sample attached to this report does not use Struts but will reproduce the 
error.  Here's the situation:

start.jsp has a jsp:include of test.jsp
test.jsp has a jsp:include of include.jsp
include.jsp throws an exception
--> infinite looping

start.jsp, test.jsp, and include.jsp all have an errorPage directive to 
error.jsp.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Doing a forward after an include was causing Jasper to go in an infinite loop. 
This has just been fixed (and the fix will be in the upcoming b6).
